skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Nowaki, a Kagerou-class destroyer. Luck? Kure and Sasebo ships have that, us Maizuru ships do not. I was unable to save Maikaze in Truk, but when I was in the Leyte Gulf I came running to Chikuma's rescue. In the end I couldn't save everyone... but in my dreams we're all still together...
skins.acquisition: This place is... Huh? Are you the commander?! Ahem! Destroyer Nowaki, reporting in!
skins.login: Zzz... Fiiine, I'll get up in a second... The sun... is so warm... Zzz...
skins.details: The Leyte Gulf? I don't remember very much of it...
skins.secretaryIdle1: If only I'd tried harder when I was in Truk...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I like this place, I don't need to hurt any of my allies here...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Arashi... Yukikaze... We're all together again in my dreams...
